section.title: Tomcat Embedded 6
section.para: A DeployableContainer implementation that can run and connect to a embedded (same JVM) Tomcat 6 Servlet Container. Only select EE APIs are available, such as JNDI and Servlet 2.5. This implementation has lifecycle support, so the container will be started and stopped as part of the test run.
section.warning: CDI support requires use of Weld Servlet.
In-container testing requires manually adding the Arquillian Protocol Servlet to the test archive's web.xml. See the in-container test in the Tomcat Embedded 6 container source for an example.
